level.heading: Protection of witnesses.
level.text: If proof of the existence of the drug-, firearm-, or prostitution-related nuisance depends, in whole or in part, upon affidavits of witnesses who are not law enforcement officers, the court in its discretion may issue orders to protect those witnesses, including, but not limited to, placing the complaint and supporting affidavits under seal.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-81 substituted "drug or prostitution-related" for "drug-related".
D.C. Law 18-259 substituted "drug-, firearm-, or prostitution-related" for "drug or prostitution-related".
